name: David Perdue
bio: David Perdue is an Atlanta based comedian who has been on Kevin Hart Presents: "Hart of the City" on Comedy Central, & "Uproarious" on Fuse TV. In 2016 he was the Laughing Skull Festival's "Set List Tournament Champion," and was a 2016 Laughing Skull Festival semi-finalist. He was selected by Creative Loafing Atlanta as one of 2017's People to Watch. He co-hosts a weekly sports/comedy podcast called Forth and Ten, and is the co-producer for the award winning show and Atlanta favorite 1AM Secret Show.
